resources.string:
Currently, you're looking at the MainActivity, and this text is displayed in the HomeFragment.
 
 The MainActivity uses a MultistackController to provide individual backstacks for each of the tabs on this screen, as suggested in the Material guidelines.
 
 Open the Features tab to see a list of some of the features that Enro provides.
 
 Open the Profile tab to see an examples of shared element transitions.
 
 Click 'Launch Example' below to launch an example that lets you play with the three different navigation instructions
This is an example destination. Try playing around with the different navigation options below.\n
This is an example of using a ResultKey and registerForNavigationResult to get a result from a navigation destination.\n \n Click the button \'Request String\' to try this out.
